item.title: ‘Bob’s Burgers’ Co-Showrunner Loren Bouchard Is Cooking Up More Ideas
item.description: With 13 Emmy nominations and a mega renewal deal under its belt, the animated series shows no signs of slowing down.

item.title: Fox Sets Fall Rollout for ‘Doc,’ ‘The Simpsons’ and Lots of Game Shows
item.description: Most of the network’s lineup will premiere in late September.
